means: 作为…的序言，作为…的开端

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"前言，导言"之意。
means: introduction ： 普通用词，指任何作品开头对读者或听众说明或介绍该作品，起引导作用的结论部分，和全书内容是一致的。
preface ： 指作者或编者为说明全书的目的、范围、编辑方法等在序言之前写的一段简短的序文。

sentence.Network_en: He has written a fine preface to the play.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为这个剧本写了一篇精彩的序言.

sentence.Network_en: Several pages of closely reasoned argument preface her account of the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那部关于战争的著述之前有几页论证严谨的序言.

sentence.Network_en: The preface to this book is on the preceding page.
sentence.Network_cn: 前边一页是这本书的序言.

list.abs: 自_互动百科 ... 自修【 study by oneself;have self-study】 自序【 author's preface;preface】 自炫【 show off oneself】.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin praefatia, alteration of Latin praefatio(n-) 'words spoken beforehand', from the verb praefari, from prae 'before' + fari 'speak'

encyclopedia.content: 歌曲信息 歌手：苏醒 所属专辑： 《秋天Ep》 歌曲标签： 华语流行平静none原创坚持 发行时间：2007-12-18 所属公司：天娱 歌词 Preface-苏醒 词：苏醒曲：苏醒 VERSE1 这个故事开始1984年的3月5日 它不是编造的动人故事所有的记录属实 并不是一首脍炙人口的流行复制 坚持的只是承认无知是我见识的现实却也真实 从一开始 所有的剧情顺利的进行曾经那份独特的心情 那个胆小却懂事的孩子拥有与众不同的聪明 从不安静 向着足球飞奔的

entry.def: A preface is an introduction at the beginning of a book, which explains what the book is about or why it was written.

entry.tran: 以…为开端；以…作为开场白
entry.def: If you preface an action or speech with something else, you do or say this other thing first.

example.ex: I will preface what I am going to say with a few lines from Shakespeare...
example.tran: 进入正题之前，我先引用莎士比亚的几句诗作为开场白。

example.ex: The president prefaced his remarks by saying he has supported unemployment benefits all along.
example.tran: 总统在发表讲话前说他一直以来都支持发放失业津贴。

means.word_mean: 1. a short introductory essay preceding the text of a book
1. furnish with a preface or introduction;

sentences.sentence: "She always precedes her lectures with a joke"
"He prefaced his lecture with a critical remark about the institution"

auth_sentence.content: I have to preface my sporting parallels with arch modesty.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have to preface my sporting parallels with arch modesty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have to preface my sporting parallels with arch modesty.

auth_sentence.content: I will preface no longer, but proceed.

stems_affixes.word_buile: facet[n.[问题等的]侧面,一面;[多面体的]面]+ious……的→做事表面化→轻浮的
in不+efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+able可以……的→adj.抹不掉的,不能消除的
efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+ment表名词→n.抹消, 抹杀
face脸,面→n.脸,面貌;表情;正面 v.面对着;朝,面向
